content.query:
Select 
    region,
    sum(Cast(Salary as NUMERIC)) as TotalSalary
FROM 
OPENROWSET(

    BULK 'https://stsynapsedemoeastus.dfs.core.windows.net/externaldata/CustomerData_LocationWise.csv',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = True,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'

) as  [Result]
GROUP BY
    REGION

Select * from 
OPENROWSET(

    BULK 'https://stsynapsedemoeastus.dfs.core.windows.net/externaldata/CustomerData_LocationWise.csv',
    FORMAT ='CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = True,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'

) as  [Result]
